short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Safeblob suggests you a secured password

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SafeBlob does one thing and does it great: it generates a secure password for you to use anywhere you subscribe. 

Setup your options via the extension icon : desired length of your password, character types you want to enable (uppercase, numbers, special characters)

A generate button will be added among the password input. Click on it to generate the password, fill the input and copy the generated password to your clipboard !
